participant_1.background:
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
i enjoy home cooked meals.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I was born in the big city, but I now live in the country with my dog.
I love my family, even though they are a little bit crazy.

participant_2.background:
I love to dance ballet but I'm not sure if my parents would approve.
i love children.
my favorite artist is guns and roses.
On rainy days, I love to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father.
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
Hi, I'm good thanks. What about you?
I'm doing well. I just got back from a walk in the park with my dog.
That sounds nice. I love going for walks in the park. I have a collie and he loves to play fetch.
Collies are so cute! I used to have a cat, but he ran away.
Aww, I'm sorry to hear that. Cats are great pets.
Yeah, they are. I miss him.
I'm sure you'll find another one someday.
Thanks, I hope so.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to read, cook, and play video games.
Cool, I like to read and play video games too. I'm not much of a cook though.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and thrillers.
I like those too. I've been reading a lot of historical fiction lately.
Oh, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah. It's about two sisters during World War II.
Oh, I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
Yeah, it's really good. I'm about halfway through it and I'm hooked.
Well, I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks
